title:
IEEE MITE + IEEE NITK Collaboration Event â€“
One Day Workshop Series on PCB Design and Image Processing
description: IEEE NITK members collaborated with IEEE MITE (Mangalore Institute of Technology and Engineering, Moodabidri) to conduct a workshop on PCB Design using KiCAD and Image Processing and Computer Vision on 18 th August, 2018. The workshop saw an attendance of 87 students from MITE and from various colleges of Mangalore Subsection.
